resources.string: • Endowment Fund: For black-owned businesses and entrepreneurial ventures
• Wealth Creation Tactic Consultations: Home Ownership, Vehicle Purchasing, Consumer Habits
Training: Certifications, General Technology Education, Digital Badge Opportunities
Mock Interview Prep, Resume Writing, and Scholarship Search Assistance
Entrepreneurial Resources: Business Plans, Funding, Pitch Decks, Sample Documentation
Meal Sponsorships – partnerships with local food kitchens
Free Health Care Screenings and education
Assist Local Chamber of Commerce / Urban League
